input.step: 1. Find the current exchange rate of US Dollar to Japanese Yen
1.1 Obtain currency pair information (Currency Pair: USD/JPY)
1.3 Obtain the current exchange rate (Exchange Rate: Current Rate)
2.2 Apply the current exchange rate to calculate
2.3 Output the calculation result (Amount in JPY: Calculated amount in JPY)
